title: Sci-Fi Sounds and Loops Vol.1
description: "Sci-Fi Textures and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

"Sci-Fi Textures and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere.


"Sci-Fi Textures and Loops Vol.1" includes sound effects such as:


• Sci-Fi Alien Artifact

• Sci-Fi Ambient

• Sci-Fi Bubble

• Sci-Fi Desert Planet

• Sci-Fi Engine

• Sci-Fi Flame

• Sci-Fi Horror Abstraction

• Sci-Fi Interference

• Sci-Fi Lo-Fi Rotation

• Sci-Fi Radio

• Sci-Fi Reverse Cycle

• Sci-Fi Rotor


Each sound effect of this sample pack has 10 variations of different pitches, loop and non-loop versions.


Product Details:

• 240 WAV files

• 96kHz/24Bit

• 1.62 GB
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 240

Number of Audio Cues: 240

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Sci-Fi Textures and Loops Vol.1 - Sound-List
